akas from release info: The Land of Wind South Korea (alternative title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

1.plot: King Yuri welcomes his new son and learns about the curse his son is born with which threatens his family and kingdom.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

2.plot: King Yuri finds a way to save both Muhyul and his throne.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

3.plot: Prince Hae Myeong reconnects with Muhyul and decides to take him under his wings.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

4.plot: Muhyul's actions Causes problems for Prince Hae Myeong Which eventually grows them closer.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

5.plot: Muhyul enters the palace with Prince Hae Myeong while someone tries to assassinate king Daeso.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

6.plot: Hae-myeong and Muyhul attack King Daeso and those with him. King Daeso recieves a sword in his back and is believed dead. With King Daeso dead, King Yuri declares war with Buyeo. Baguek sees that King Daeso is alive.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

7.plot: King Daeso captures and executes hundreds of Goguryeo troops. Baeguek escorts Prince Hae-myeong to surrender himself to King Daeso. Muhyul gets shot by an arrow in his chest by Jolbon troops trying to rescue Prince Hae-myeong.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

8.plot: Muhyul denies King Yuri as his King, and he and Maro begin training to become Black Shadows under Wesaja. Muhyul discovers Yeon is the daughter of Wesaja, and a Princess of Buyeo. In order to gain good allegiance, King Yuri marries his daughter, Princess Seryu, to the Gisan tribe.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

9.plot: Dojin, Yeon, and Muhyul are sent to kill the Xin leader when the Crown Prince is named. Yeon steals a map to help Muhyul. Muhyul wants to kill King Yuri. Yeon serves the Queen. Prince Daein dies, destroying the alliance with Xin. Muhyul is jealous of Maro and Yeon.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

10.plot: Wesaja is charged with treason. King Yuri orders the death of Wesaja's household. Wesaja helps Yeon escape, dying. Dojin is sent to Xin. Princess Seryu returns following the death of her husband. Muhyul and Maro learn there is a spy among them. King Daeso orders them to kill King Yuri.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

11.plot: Muhyul remembers Prince Haemyeong's death and vows to kill King Yuri, who is tortured by dreams of Prince Haemyeong. Prince Yeojin is confined within the palace. Baguek plots to kill the prince. Muhyul and Maro rescue Prince Yeojin and hold him for ransom. They insist King Yuri meet them.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

12.plot:

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

13.plot: Yeon tells Muhyul that King Yuri was not responsible for Prince Haemyeong's death. He returns to the palace and asks to see his father. Muhyul begs forgiveness, offering to spy for Goguryeo. Maro and Muhyul spy in Buyeo. Princess Seryu sees Dojin wearing the necklace she gave baby Muhyul.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

14.plot: Maengwaeng helps Muhyul and Maro escape; they become King Daeso's elite bodyguards. King Yuri is tired of Biryu's making trouble without attacking. Muhyul shoots King Daseo. Dojin is secretly heir to the throne of Buyeo. Muyhul tells Yeon that he avenged her father's death. Dojin sees them entwined.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

15.plot:

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

16.plot: Baeguek and Lord Yongam claim Hye Ape is conspiring with Buyeo against Gogureyeo. King Yuri orders the release of Muhyul and Maro. The King refuses to acknowledge Muhyul as heir. Hye Ap conspires with Changmunim to prepare Muhyul to take the throne. Rumors spread that the "dead" prince is alive.

17.title: Episode #1.17

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

17.plot: Dojin deducts Muhyul's identity and spreads rumors to cause panic throughout the kingdom. Princess Seryu asks Muhyul to find her dead brother. Muhyul finally understands who he really is. He reflects on his time with Prince Haemyoung, now realizing they were true brothers. King Yuri bemoans the prophecy.

18.title: Episode #1.18

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

18.plot: King Yuri contracts the same mysterious pestilence that has affected several hundred subjects. Muhyul, who went missing from the palace, suddenly reappears to deliver the antidote he stole from Buyeo to Yeon. Later, the ailing King receives the antidote while Muhyul accounts for his disappearance.

19.title: Episode #1.19

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

19.plot: In the wake of the pestilence that almost claimed his life, King Yuri introduces his third-born prince. That prince is none other than Muhyul. The announcement meets with the Council's dissent. They are convinced Muhyul's curse will be the downfall of Goguryeo.

21.title: Episode #1.21

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

21.plot: The council meets to discuss continuing with Prince Muhyul or surrendering after losing a major battle. Another battle begins but Prince Muhyul has no strategy to win against King Daeso's chariots.

24.title: Episode #1.24

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

24.plot: Yeon requested to return to Goguryeo, as she can't forget Mu-Hyul. And it has cause Do-Jin furious.

25.title: Episode #1.25

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

25.plot: Yeon returned to Goguryeo with the status of Princess of Buyeo. She secretly meet up with Mu-Hyul before his marriage.

26.title: Episode #1.26

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

26.plot: Ma-Ro know Mu-Hyul wasn't happy and spent his time in training camp. So, he bring Mu-Hyul to meet Yeon in her hideout. When Mu-Hyul is away, Yi-Ji come to the camp to meet Mu-Hyul.

27.title: Episode #1.27

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

27.plot: King Yuri has been seized by Bae Kuk. Meanwhile, Mu-Hyul has less than a thousand soldiers on his hand. How will he protect his country?

28.title: Episode #1.28

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

28.plot: Yeo-Jin passed away due to serious injury. Mu-Hyul intends to reclaim the lost lands.

29.title: Episode #1.29

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

29.plot: Do-Jin failed to take possession on heavenly sword. Mu-Hyul realizes the missing of Yeon.

30.title: Episode #1.30

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

30.plot: After obtained the heavenly sword, Bae-Kuk finally exposed his ambition, and broke the alliance between King Dae-So and him.

32.title: Episode #1.32

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

32.plot: Pensando que una acusación podría destruir a su madre, Orestes trata de justificarla, pero lo que consigue es enojar a Valentina.

33.title: Episode #1.33

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

33.plot: Al sentirse engañada, Tza Tza reclama justicia ante la decisión del juez de despojar de todos sus bienes a Valentina.

34.title: Episode #1.34

episode of.title: The Kingdom of the Winds (TV Series 2008–2009)

34.plot: Dojin, the master mind that he is, disguises his true intentions by allowing Muhyul to come to Buyeo and find his faithful wife and son. Muhyul shows his anxiousness through impatience in the way things turn out.

36.plot: Ilusionado ante el deseo de Valentina en quererlo como se merece, Franklin está a punto de besarla. Pandora y Jordi irrumpen en la oficina.

imdb.title: The Kingdom of the Winds
plot: Story of of king Daemusin, third ruler of Goguryeo and grandson of king Jumong.::NJ
